ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“No way, cat!
You gotta lot of guts acting like
a friend but being a spy!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // {Cloud}
“He'll never tell the truth.
Once a spy, always a spy.”{PAUSE}“We can't go on with
someone like that.
C'mon get real!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:55}); // {Cloud}
“…Well, we're stuck…
We'll have to do what he says.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Aeris}
“…I trusted you.
I can't believe you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Aeris}
“So you're from Shinra.
Who? Who are you!
Tell me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Aeris}
“…And so on, and so on…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:57}); // {Aeris}
“I wonder if Marlene is all right…
I wonder what happened to Mom?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Barret}
“The hell are ya!?
What's your real name!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Barret}
“Hmph! You ain't foolin' us this time!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Tifa}
“So you're from Shinra.
Who are you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Yuffie}
“Part of the Shinra!
Who the *&$# are you!?”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 ea ff 79 f9 e1 fe a6 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Cait Sith}
“Hey! Over here!
The Keystone!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cait Sith}
“W, wait a second.
I won't run or hide.”{PAUSE}“Yes, I was a spy.
I was hired by the Shinra.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cait Sith}
“I couldn't help it.”{PAUSE}“How 'bout if we go on like
nothing ever happened?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Cait Sith}
“Then, what are you goin' to do?
Kill me?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Cait Sith}
“Whoa, I can't tell you my name.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Cait Sith}
“See? I told you!
Talking won't do any good, so can't
we just continue our journey?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Cait Sith}
“…Alright, yes, I am a Shinra employee.”{PAUSE}“But we're not entirely enemies.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {Cait Sith}
“…Something bothers me.
I think it's your way of life.”{PAUSE}“You don't get paid.
You don't get praised. Yet, you
still risk your lives and continue on
your journey. Seeing that makes me…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Cait Sith}
“It just makes me think about my life.
I don't think I'd feel too good
if things ended the way they are now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Cait Sith}
“…just as I thought.
Talking won't make a bit of difference.”{PAUSE}“But I prepared something in case
this happened.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // {Cait Sith}
“Why don't you listen to this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Cait Sith}
“…So, you have to do as I say.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // {Cait Sith}
“I didn't want to do this…
using dirty tricks and
taking hostages…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Cait Sith}
“But this is how it is…no compromises.
So why don't we go on as we did?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // {Cait Sith}
“Oh, you didn't seem to know this, but…”{PAUSE}“The Keystone is the key to the
Temple of the Ancients.
Even so, you're all going, right?”{PAUSE}“I know where it is, so
I'll show you later.”{PAUSE}“The Shinra have already been there, but
I guess you have to deal with that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Cait Sith}
“Tomorrow is the Temple of the Ancients, right?
I know where it is
so I'll tell you later.”{PAUSE}“Of course,we'll get there after the Shinra,
but you'll have to deal with that.”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 bc 00 ea f3 ca fb 0d 00
c3 00 00 01 a4 ff ea fd ea 01 14 00

dialogStrings:
{Cait Sith}
“Hey! Over here!
The Keystone!”

Tseng
“Well done.”

{Cloud}
“Hey!”

{Cait Sith}
“W, wait a second.
I won't run or hide.”{PAUSE}“Yes, I was a spy.
I was hired by the Shinra.”

{Tifa}
“Don't mess with us!”

{Aeris}
“…I trusted you.
I can't believe you!”
“Ya dirty &*$*%$!”

{Cloud}
“You think I'm jokin'!?”

{Cait Sith}
“I couldn't help it.”{PAUSE}“How 'bout if we go on like
nothing ever happened?”

{Cloud}
“No way, cat!
You gotta lot of guts acting like
a friend but being a spy!”

{Cait Sith}
“Then, what are you goin' to do?
Kill me?”

{Cait Sith}
“You'd just be wastin' your time if you tried.
This body's just a toy anyway.”{PAUSE}“My real body's at Shinra Headquarters
in Midgar.
I'm controlin' this
toy cat from there.”

{Tifa}
“So you're from Shinra.
Who are you?”

{Aeris}
“So you're from Shinra.
Who? Who are you!
Tell me!”

{Barret}
“The hell are ya!?
What's your real name!?”

{Yuffie}
“Part of the Shinra!
Who the *&$# are you!?”

{Cait Sith}
“Whoa, I can't tell you my name.”

{Cloud}
“We're not gettin' anywhere.”

{Cait Sith}
“See? I told you!
Talking won't do any good, so can't
we just continue our journey?”

{Cait Sith}
“…Alright, yes, I am a Shinra employee.”{PAUSE}“But we're not entirely enemies.”

{Cait Sith}
“…Something bothers me.
I think it's your way of life.”{PAUSE}“You don't get paid.
You don't get praised. Yet, you
still risk your lives and continue on
your journey. Seeing that makes me…”

{Cait Sith}
“It just makes me think about my life.
I don't think I'd feel too good
if things ended the way they are now.”

{Tifa}
“You're lying again.”

{Aeris}
“…And so on, and so on…”

{Barret}
“Hmph! You ain't foolin' us this time!”

{Yuffie}
“Sounds fishy…”

{Cloud}
“He'll never tell the truth.
Once a spy, always a spy.”{PAUSE}“We can't go on with
someone like that.
C'mon get real!!”

{Cait Sith}
“…just as I thought.
Talking won't make a bit of difference.”{PAUSE}“But I prepared something in case
this happened.”

{Cait Sith}
“Why don't you listen to this?”
“Papa! {Tifa}!”

{Tifa}
“Marlene!”

{Aeris}
“Hey! That's Marlene!”

{Barret}
“Ma…Marlene!?”

{Cloud}
“…Marlene?”

“Hey! It's dad!
Dad! It's me, Marlene!”

“Hey! It's {Tifa}!
{Tifa}! Help, I'm-”

“Hey! It's the flower lady!
Flower lady…”
“Hey! It's {Cloud}!”

{Cait Sith}
“…So, you have to do as I say.”

{Cloud}
“You're the lowest…”

{Cait Sith}
“I didn't want to do this…
using dirty tricks and
taking hostages…”

{Cait Sith}
“But this is how it is…no compromises.
So why don't we go on as we did?”

{Cait Sith}
“Tomorrow is the Temple of the Ancients, right?
I know where it is
so I'll tell you later.”{PAUSE}“Of course,we'll get there after the Shinra,
but you'll have to deal with that.”

{Cait Sith}
“Oh, you didn't seem to know this, but…”{PAUSE}“The Keystone is the key to the
Temple of the Ancients.
Even so, you're all going, right?”{PAUSE}“I know where it is, so
I'll show you later.”{PAUSE}“The Shinra have already been there, but
I guess you have to deal with that.”

{Cloud}
“…Well, we're stuck…
We'll have to do what he says.”

{Tifa}
“…Marlene.”

{Aeris}
“I wonder if Marlene is all right…
I wonder what happened to Mom?”

{Barret}
“Sorry, {Cloud}.”

{Yuffie}
“Uh, yup.”
Chocobo Square
